snippet: Mark Murphy, 41, is struggling for recognition in a congressional race that national Democrats, seeking control of the House, had hoped would be a plum opportunity to pick up a seat.
abstract: Democrat Mark Murphy is struggling for recognition in race against Republican Rep Michael G Grimm for Congressional seat in New York City's 13th District; Democrats across the nation, seeking control of the House, view race as a plum opportunity to pick up a seat, and party's elite are swooping in for support.
lead_paragraph: Mark Murphy, 41, is struggling for recognition in a congressional race that national Democrats, seeking control of the House, had hoped would be a plum opportunity to pick up a seat.

headline.seo: In Crucial Race, Mark Murphy, a Democrat, Seeks Traction
headline.main: A Seat for the Taking, but First Seeking Traction
headline.print_headline: A Seat for the Taking, but First Seeking Traction
